system.description:
Your various sources of supernatural power have started to blur together as you bring weapons, healing and protective magics, and psychic prowess to bear. You can solve—or cause—a truly impressive number of problems. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Intelligence, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your herald levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Thought Shield feature.
  • Half your esper levels count as herald levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.xezwxikwrsfkzg4o]{Sacred Aura} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.eg3jukesb09wd7ot]{Improved Sacred Aura} features.
  • You gain the following Channel Divinity option:

Psychic Refraction

When you or a friendly creature within 30 feet of you would take force, necrotic, or psychic damage or suffer a level of strife, you can use your reaction and a use of Channel Divinity to negate the triggering effect and reflect it back on its source, which must make a Wisdom save against your Psionics save DC or suffer psychic damage equal to the damage bonus of your Divine Smite.
